headline: Seagate ESOP Shelf Filing Raises Dilution Questions After Strong Share Gains
summary: Seagate Technology Holdings filed a shelf registration statement covering up to $6.6b in ordinary shares tied to its employee stock ownership plan. The filing gives the company flexibility to issue shares over time for ESOP purposes, potentially influencing future share count and employee ownership. The registration relates to ordinary shares of Seagate Technology Holdings, which trades on the NasdaqGS under the ticker NasdaqGS:STX. For investors watching NasdaqGS:STX, this filing sits...
